member.name: M:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.StsClient.AssumeRole(TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to request for the temporary security credentials of a role.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.StsClient.AssumeRoleSync(TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to request for the temporary security credentials of a role.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.StsClient.AssumeRoleWithSAML(TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleWithSAMLRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to request for the temporary credentials for a role that has been authenticated via a SAML assertion.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.StsClient.AssumeRoleWithSAMLSync(TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleWithSAMLRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to request for the temporary credentials for a role that has been authenticated via a SAML assertion.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.StsClient.AssumeRoleWithWebIdentity(TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleWithWebIdentityRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to apply for an OIDC role credential.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.StsClient.AssumeRoleWithWebIdentitySync(TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleWithWebIdentityRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to apply for an OIDC role credential.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.StsClient.GetCallerIdentity(TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetCallerIdentityRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to get the identity information of the current caller. The persistent keys of the root account and sub-account as well as the temporary credentials generated by `AssumeRole` and `GetFederationToken` can be used to get the identity information.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.StsClient.GetCallerIdentitySync(TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetCallerIdentityRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to get the identity information of the current caller. The persistent keys of the root account and sub-account as well as the temporary credentials generated by `AssumeRole` and `GetFederationToken` can be used to get the identity information.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.StsClient.GetFederationToken(TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetFederationTokenRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to get temporary credentials for a federated user.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.StsClient.GetFederationTokenSync(TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetFederationTokenRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to get temporary credentials for a federated user.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleRequest.RoleArn
member.summary: Resource descriptions of a role, which can be obtained by clicking the role name in the [CAM console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/cam/role). General role: qcs::cam::uin/12345678:role/4611686018427397919, qcs::cam::uin/12345678:roleName/testRoleName Service role: qcs::cam::uin/12345678:role/tencentcloudServiceRole/4611686018427397920, qcs::cam::uin/12345678:role/tencentcloudServiceRoleName/testServiceRoleName

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleRequest.RoleSessionName
member.summary: User-defined temporary session name. It can contain 2-128 letters, digits, and symbols (=,.@_-). Regex: [\w+=,.@_-]*

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleRequest.DurationSeconds
member.summary: Specifies the validity period of credentials in seconds. Default value: 7200. Maximum value: 43200

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleRequest.Policy
member.summary: Policy description Note: 1. The policy needs to be URL-encoded (if you request a TencentCloud API through the GET method, all parameters must be URL-encoded again in accordance with [Signature v3](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/598/33159?from_cn_redirect=1#1.-.E6.8B.BC.E6.8E.A5.E8.A7.84.E8.8C.83.E8.AF.B7.E6.B1.82.E4.B8.B2) before the request is sent). 2. For the policy syntax, please see CAM's [Syntax Logic](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/598/10603?from_cn_redirect=1). 3. The policy cannot contain the `principal` element.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleRequest.ExternalId
member.summary: External role ID, which can be obtained by clicking the role name in the [CAM console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/cam/role). It can contain 2-128 letters, digits, and symbols (=,.@:/-). Regex: [\w+=,.@:\/-]*

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleRequest.Tags
member.summary: List of session tags. Up to 50 tags are allowed. The tag keys can not duplicate.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.AssumeRoleRequest.SourceIdentity
member.summary: UIN of the initiator

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetCallerIdentityResponse.Arn
member.summary: ARN of the current caller.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetCallerIdentityResponse.AccountId
member.summary: Root account UIN of the current caller.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetCallerIdentityResponse.UserId
member.summary: User ID. 1. If the caller is a Tencent Cloud account, the UIN of the current account is returned. 2. If the caller is a role, `roleId:roleSessionName` is returned. 3. If the caller is a federated user, `uin:federatedUserName` is returned.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetCallerIdentityResponse.PrincipalId
member.summary: Account UIN. 1. If the caller is a Tencent Cloud account, the UIN of the current account is returned. 2. If the caller is a role, the UIN of the account that applies for the role is returned.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetCallerIdentityResponse.Type
member.summary: Identity type.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetCallerIdentityResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetFederationTokenRequest.Name
member.summary: The customizable name of the caller, consisting of letters

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetFederationTokenRequest.Policy
member.summary: Policy description Note: 1. The policy needs to be URL-encoded (if you request a TencentCloud API through the GET method, all parameters must be URL-encoded again in accordance with [Signature v3](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/598/33159?from_cn_redirect=1#1.-.E6.8B.BC.E6.8E.A5.E8.A7.84.E8.8C.83.E8.AF.B7.E6.B1.82.E4.B8.B2) before the request is sent). 2. For the policy syntax, please see CAM's [Syntax Logic](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/598/10603?from_cn_redirect=1). 3. The policy cannot contain the `principal` element.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetFederationTokenRequest.DurationSeconds
member.summary: The validity period of temporary credentials in seconds. Default value: 1,800s. Maximum value for a root account: 7,200s. Maximum value for a sub-account: 129,600s.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetFederationTokenRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.summary: Temporary credentials expiration time. A Unix timestamp will be returned which is accurate to the second

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetFederationTokenResponse.Expiration
member.summary: Credentials expiration time in UTC time in ISO 8601 format. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Sts.V20180813.Models.GetFederationTokenResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
